title: Hello Research — Brief introduction to goresearch specification
snippet: goresearch is an AI-powered research report generator that helps developers and researchers create validated, citation-rich reports from a single Markdown brief. This introduction covers the basic specification and core functionality.

title: Hello Research — Brief introduction to goresearch documentation
snippet: Complete documentation for goresearch covering installation, usage, and examples. Perfect hello research tool for developers who need reliable, cited research reports with evidence checking.

title: Hello Research — Brief introduction to goresearch reference
snippet: Step-by-step reference for using goresearch. Learn how this hello research tool generates professional reports by searching the web, extracting content, and synthesizing findings with proper citations.

title: Hello Research — Brief introduction to goresearch tutorial
snippet: Tutorial guide for goresearch. Includes examples of well-structured research briefs and resulting reports. Essential tutorial for hello research workflows.
